name: Quick & Easy
description:
Quick & Easy is a game where you can make meals in 100 seconds or less! Cook, chop, and stack things to create the recipes found in the cook book.

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 100 and the theme for this jam was, well, "100". This game uses that theme in the 100 seconds time limit.

Controls and credits can be found in-game. Note: The controls can be awkward at first, but that's part of the fun! Give it some time and you can master them.

Post your hi-scores below!

Also, I'll try to get a web browser version up soon!
